text:
[Verse]
Golden sky endless sea
Colors burst in front of me
Waves roll soft the sand so warm
Sunset dreams in perfect form

[Verse 2]
Whispers breeze through the trees
Nature's symphony with ease
Heartbeats sync no need to speak
Magic moments feel the peak

[Chorus]
Sunset dreams we chase the light
Hold my hand into the night
Stars above our guides they be
In this dream just you and me

[Verse 3]
Shadows stretch long and lean
Twilight paints the perfect scene
Moonrise slow a gentle glow
In this place we’ll always know

[Chorus]
Sunset dreams we chase the light
Hold my hand into the night
Stars above our guides they be
In this dream just you and me

[Bridge]
Every color tells a tale
In the wind our letters sail
Time stands still just for a while
Sunset dreams always in style
title: Sunset Dreams
